type.name: Props
type.desc: The photo uploader will create preview elements for each photo and have a hidden input field populated with the `photoId` received when the photo was updated.

types.type:
The function to call when a photo was removed.
The function to call when a photo was added.
The name of the hidden `input` fields. Default `files[]`.
The callback to call when a photo was uploaded with the `result` property of the server response.
<prop opt type="!Array" string name="uploadedResults"> The list of photos which were saved and don't need uploading.
The URL where to upload files.
